characters.name: Raymond
characters.about: Raymond is a very precise fellow. His signature glasses must always be at a specific angle on his nose. If they're even slightly off-kilter, he won't be able to get any work done that day!

characters.name: Cyd
characters.about: On an average day, you can find Cyd posted up in his bedroom, rocking out to his favourite music. He loves to crank up the volume, but he's also mindful on his neighbors.

characters.name: Dom
characters.about: Dom is always gazing up at the sky...even in the middle of a conversation. He claims heâ€™s keeping his head up in search of a brighter future, but he swears he never looks directly at the sun.

characters.name: Dotty
characters.about: She wants to be a star, and she's not particular about what field she makes it big in. Singing, acting, sports- the important thing is that everyone knows her name!

characters.name: Rowan
characters.about: He came to the sporting life late, but he's making up for lost time by throwing everything he's got into it. Go big or go home!

characters.name: Wolfgang
characters.about: He does what he wants. He says what he wants. He thinks what he wants. If you look up 'lone wolf' in the dictionary, there's a picture of him.

characters.name: Bob
characters.about: Bob is an easygoing kind of guy. He doesn't worry too much about what he does or says, which doesn't always end well.

characters.name: Cherry
characters.about: Cherry's fashion sense always makes her stand out. She's great to take to events with large crowds. You'll never lose each other!

characters.name: Stitches
characters.about: Due to his relaxed personality and slow-moving nature, Stitches is often confused with plush look-alikes. Just so we're clear, he is NOT a toy.

characters.name: Fauna
characters.about: Fauna is polite, reliable, and loved by all. She really doesn't have any major flaws. Well, other than her hypercompetitiveness. If you play cards with her, don't make eye contact.

characters.name: Bam
characters.about: With Bam, there are no surprises. His outspoken nature can be jarring at first, but he isn't afraid to say what's on his mind.
